scripts.test: npx hardhat test && echo "Tests passed" || echo "Tests failed"
scripts.deploy:test: npx hardhat run scripts/deployMaster.js && echo "Deploy Success" || echo "Deploy Failed"
scripts.deploy:node: npx hardhat test && npx hardhat run scripts/deployMaster.js --network localhost && echo "Deploy Success" || echo "Deploy Failed"
scripts.deploy:rinkeby: npx hardhat test && npx hardhat run scripts/deployMaster.js --network rinkeby && echo "Deploy Success" || echo "Deploy Failed"
scripts.deploy:mainnet: npx hardhat test && npx hardhat run scripts/deployMaster.js --network mainnet && echo "Deploy Success" || echo "Deploy Failed"
